item.content:encoded:
Why are you so afraid of silence?

Silence! A precious feeling. We all run away from silence! But then again we want silence when we are troubled or when we need to do deep thinking. Why? Because we know, we will get answers if we remain silent for a while and just think about the situation.

Instead of waiting to be in a situation to be silent, why can’t we start our day observing silence for 10 minutes every day before we start our day? To introspect ourselves and to plan our day ahead!

It might not be possible to do so at the start of the day, and then do it towards the end of the day. When you are done with your chores of the day. Switch off the idiot box, keep your phone away and just be your own. Analysing your day, planning the next day, and thinking about good things happened through the day.

Doing this is same as meditation. It will make you calmer, sharper and will enable you to make good decisions rather than hasty decisions. A calm mind helps you make better sections and grow personally and professionally.

Whosoever said Silence is Golden Knew the true essence of Silence.
